scripts.start: concurrently "cd api && npm run dev" "cd web && npm run dev" "node index.js"
scripts.preinstall: cd api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../lib && npm install
scripts.uninstall: npx rimraf api/node_modules api/package-lock.json web/node_modules web/package-lock.json lib/node_modules lib/package-lock.json node_modules package-lock.json
